title: Identity elements
content: According to Wikipedia ("Identity element", 7-Feb-2020, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Identity_element ): "In mathematics, an _identity element_, or _neutral element_, is a special type of element of a set with respect to a binary operation on that set, which leaves any element of the set unchanged when combined with it.". Or in more detail "... an element e of S is called a _left identity_ if e * a = a for all a in S, and a _right identity_ if a * e = a for all a in S. If e is both a left identity and a right identity, then it is called a _two-sided identity_, or simply an _identity_." We concentrate on two-sided identities in the following. The existence of an identity (an identity is unique if it exists, see ~ mgmidmo ) is an important property of monoids (see ~ mndid ), and therefore also for groups (see ~ grpid ), but also for magmas not required to be associative. Magmas with an identity element are called "unital magmas" (see Definition 2 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 12) or, if the magmas are cancellative, "loops" (see definition in [Bruck] p. 15). In the context of extensible structures, the identity element (of any magma ` M `) is defined as "group identity element" ` ( 0g `` M ) `, see ~ df-0g . Related theorems which are already valid for magmas are provided in the following.

blocks.name: mgmidmo
blocks.content: A two-sided identity element is unique (if it exists) in any magma. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.) (Revised by NM, 17-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgmidmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wrmo(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpbir(wrmo(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wi(wa(wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  rgen2a(s0, hs0, c0, wi(wa(wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  syl2ani(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))
  ralimi(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  simpl(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))
  ralimi(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))
  simpr(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  an42s(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  sylan9req(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  rspcva(s1, cv(s0), c0, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  oveq1(cv(s1), cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))
  id(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  rspcva(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0), c1)
  id(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  rmo4(s0, hs0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))
  ovanraleqv(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), c1, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.hs0.w(wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
}

blocks.name: grpidval
blocks.content: The value of the identity element of a group. (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpidval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))

  eqtri(c0, cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), cfv(c0g, c3))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c0g, c3), cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c3, universe, c0g, cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  iotabidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  raleqbidv(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cbs)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  oveqd(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cplusg, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cplusg)
  df-0g(hs0, s0, s1)
  iotaex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0g, c3), cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, c0g)
  syl(wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), emptycls), wn(weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))
  con3i(wcel(c3, universe), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  syl(weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c3, universe), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  euex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  exlimiv(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wcel(c3, universe))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wcel(c3, universe))
  nsyl2(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  n0i(cv(s0), c1)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c3), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, cbs)
  iotanul(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c3)

blocks.name: grpidpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same base set, and the values of their group (addition) operations are equal for all pairs of elements of the base set, they have the same identity element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpidpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1), cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), w0)
  iotabidv(s0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  3bitr3d(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))

blocks.name: mgmidcl

thm mgmidcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  simpld(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), cv(s1)))))
  mpbiri(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), cv(s1))))), wceq(c0, c0))
  eqid(c0)
  ismgmid(s1, s0, c0, c1, c3, c0, c2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgmidcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(0 ` c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(+ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c3]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c3]s0)= s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  simpld(w0, c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((c0[c3]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c3]c0)= s1)))
  mpbiri(w0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((c0[c3]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c3]c0)= s1))), c0 = c0)
  eqid(c0)
  ismgmid(s1, s0, c0, c1, c3, c0, c2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

} = {
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(co(c2, c3, c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), c0)), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(c2, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c2), cv(s1)))))
  simprd(w0, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(c2, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c2), cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, c1))
  mpbiri(w0, wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(c2, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c2), cv(s1))))), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  ismgmid(s1, s0, c2, c1, c3, c2, c4, w0)
  rspccva(s1, c1, c0, wa(wceq(co(c2, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c2), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(c2, c3, c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), c0)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(co(c2, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c2), cv(s1)), wceq(co(c2, c3, c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), c0))
  eqeq12d(co(c2, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(c2, c3, c0), c0, wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c0, c2, c3)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s1), c3, c2), cv(s1), co(c0, c3, c2), c0, wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s1), c0, c3, c2)
  id(wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(co(c2, c3, c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(c2, c3, c0), c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, c3, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(c0, c3, c2), c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: ismgmid2
blocks.content: Show that a given element is the identity element of a magma. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismgmid2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqcomd(c0, c1, w0)
  mpbi2and(w0, wceq(c1, c0), wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), cv(s0)))))
  ismgmid(s0, hs0, c0, c2, c4, c1, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(hs0, c2, wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), cv(s0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wa(wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), cv(s0))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), cv(s0)))
  rspcev(hs0, c0, c2, wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))
  ovanraleqv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2, cv(s0), c4, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0), co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c4, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), cv(s0)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ismgmid2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c1 =(0 ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c0[c4]s0)= s0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(s0[c4]c0)= s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqcomd(c0, c1, w0)
  mpbi2and(w0, c1 = c0, c0 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,((c0[c4]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c4]c0)= s0)))
  ismgmid(s0, hs0, c0, c2, c4, c1, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,((hs0[c4]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c4]hs0)= s0))), c0 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,((c0[c4]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c4]c0)= s0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, ((c0[c4]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c4]c0)= s0))
  jca((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), (c0[c4]s0)= s0, (s0[c4]c0)= s0)
  rspcev(hs0, c0, c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,((c0[c4]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c4]c0)= s0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,((hs0[c4]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c4]hs0)= s0)))
  ovanraleqv(s0, hs0, c0, c2, s0, c4, s0, (hs0[c4]s0)= s0, (c0[c4]s0)= s0)
  eqeq1d((hs0[c4]s0), s0, (c0[c4]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, c4, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c2,((c0[c4]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c4]c0)= s0)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: grpidd
blocks.content: Deduce the identity element of a magma from its properties. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpidd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c0), cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  ismgmid2(s0, c0, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), c1, cfv(cplusg, c1), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eleqtrd(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), c2, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0), co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  oveqd(c0, c3, cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), c0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  biimpar(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  eqtr3d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), c0), cv(s0), co(cv(s0), c3, c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  oveqd(cv(s0), c3, c0, cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0g, c1)
  diff.c0g.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c1)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cplusg, c1)
  diff.cplusg.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpidd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 =(0 ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 =(+ ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c0[c3]s0)= s0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(s0[c3]c0)= s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  ismgmid2(s0, c0, (0 ` c1), (Base ` c1), c1, (+ ` c1), w0)
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  eleqtrd(c0, (Base ` c1), c2, w0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(Base ` c1), (c0[(+ ` c1)]s0)= s0, s0 ∈ c2)
  eqtr3d((c0[(+ ` c1)]s0), s0, (c0[c3]s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  oveqd(c0, c3, s0, (+ ` c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(Base ` c1), (s0[(+ ` c1)]c0)= s0, s0 ∈ c2)
  biimpar(w0, s0 ∈(Base ` c1), s0 ∈ c2)
  eleq2d(s0, c2, (Base ` c1), w0)
  eqtr3d((s0[(+ ` c1)]c0), s0, (s0[c3]c0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  oveqd(s0, c3, c0, (+ ` c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c2, c3 =(+ ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0g, c1)
  diff.c0g.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c1)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cplusg, c1)
  diff.cplusg.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: mgmidsssn0
blocks.content: Property of the set of identities of ` G ` . Either ` G ` has no identities, and ` O = (/) ` , or it has one and this identity is unique and identified by the ` 0g ` function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgmidsssn0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, csn(c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, c4, wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, csn(c3))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, csn(c3))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  syl5eqss(c2, csn(c3), crab(s0, c4, wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(crab(s0, c4, wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), csn(c3)), wral(s0, c4, wi(wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c3)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c4, wcel(c0, c1), wi(wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c3))))
  expr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c3)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c3)), wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  eqcomd(cv(s0), c3, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wceq(c3, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  ismgmid(s1, hs0, cv(s0), c4, c5, c3, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wrex(hs0, c4, wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))))
  rspcev(hs0, cv(s0), c4, wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))
  ovanraleqv(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0), c4, cv(s1), c5, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))
  velsn(s0, c3)
  rabss(s0, c4, csn(c3), wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
}
